sentences.sentence: Tourists watch catamarans moored outside a restaurant in Jamaica's Montego Bay.
sentences.translation: 在牙买加蒙特哥湾的一个饭店外面，很多游客们观看停在水面上的双体船。

sentences.sentence: Each hull of its catamarans has an underwater duct which serves two functions (see illustration).
sentences.translation: 其双体船的每面船体都有水下管道，提供两种功能(见插图)。

sentences.sentence: These experienced monohull sailors are relishing the challenge of racing the Extreme 40 catamarans.
sentences.translation: 他们对单体船航行非常有经验，也乐于接受极限40双体船带来的挑战。
